price: Ó sọ pé: “Ṣé kí n̄g gbà yín gbọ́ lórí rẹ̀ bí kò ṣe bí mó ṣe gbà yín gbọ́ ní ìṣaájú lórí ọmọ-ìyá rẹ̀? Nítorí náà, Allāhu lóore jùlọ ní Olùṣọ́. Òun sì ni Aláàánú-jùlọ nínú àwọn aláàánú.”
arabic: قَالَ هَلۡ ءَامَنُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا كَمَآ أَمِنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَخِيهِ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ حَٰفِظٗاۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla hal āmanukum ʿalayhi illā kamā amintukum ʿalā akhīhi min qablu fal-lahu khayrun ḥāfiẓan wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
